metadata.title: CVE-2023-52785 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: scsi:ufs: core: Fix racing issue between ufshcd_mcq_abort() and ISR If commandtimeout happens and cq complete IRQ is raised at the same time,ufshcd_mcq_abort clears lprb->cmd and a NULL pointer deref happens in theISR. Error log: ufshcd_abort: Device abort task at tag 18 Unable to handlekernel NULL pointer dereference at virtual address 0000000000000108 pc :[0xffffffe27ef867ac] scsi_dma_unmap+0xc/0x44 lr : [0xffffffe27f1b898c]ufshcd_release_scsi_cmd+0x24/0x114

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
